name: FZMA BOT
tagline: A chat bot for H1Z1 KotK & JS  by H1Z1FZMA.com
body:
### What is FZMA BOT?
The `FZMA BOT` is an API for custom commands on most 
chat bots. Commands can be setup freely to anything, 
or default command as !fzma or !h1` to easily and quickly
enter the extra command/trigger or text to search. 
Enter an items name 

### Availability
With chat bot integration on the rise `FZMA BOT`
is available for various chat bot therefor chats. 
Here are known and tested Chat Bots:
- Nightbot
- Moobot
- Revlo
- Vivbot

Known and tested chats:
- Discord
- Twitch
- YouTube
- ReStream.io

***

### How to use?
Some examples of basic commands are:

```
!fzma help
!fzma ar15
!fzma medkit
```

### Manual Setup
To setup manually on Nightbot, Moobot, etc by adding a custom command on the website. Click  `Add Command`, then in the Command field type `!fzma` or `!kotk` or anything you'd like. Then in the Message field enter `$(customapi http://h1z1fzma.com/api/kotk.php?bot_input=$(querystring))`

### Direct Setup
For nightbot/moobot/etc enter 

```
!addcom !fzma $(customapi http://h1z1fzma.com/api/kotk.php?bot_input=$(querystring))
```

***

### SOLD! Wait its FREE?!?
Yes, this bot api is FREE! That said I would love some donations to upgrade from a free web host to a renting a real server. With that said again, I am in no way shape or form asking for donations. The free server host I have now
works... Responses may just be a little slower. Tired of slow responses from our server and don't trust me with
your money? That cool too, the code is available for you to download and host on your own server or localhost.
You can use git to keep up-to-date or download manually.
